[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/react](./react.md) &gt; [RemirrorManagerProps](./react.remirrormanagerprops.md) &gt; [extensions](./react.remirrormanagerprops.extensions.md)

## RemirrorManagerProps.extensions property

Inject custom extensions into the Remirror manager.

Each extension must be in the form of a prioritized extension which determines the order in which it'll be loaded.

By default these are placed after the JSX `RemirrorExtension`<!-- -->'s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
extensions?: Array<FlexibleExtension<AnyExtension>>;
```
